channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Carvana survived a debt crunch. Can it survive Amazon?
item.description: Carvana’s stunning rebound is facing its biggest test yet: Amazon.

item.title: Why the real poverty line is $140,000, this strategist argues
item.description: A 1963-era calculation no longer makes sense, one strategist says.

item.title: Novo Nordisk’s oral GLP-1 drug didn’t work on Alzheimer’s as hoped, and the stock tumbles
item.description: Novo Nordisk’s stock tumbles after its oral GLP-1 drug failed to show much benefit over a placebo against Alzheimer’s.

item.title: Rebuffed for the second time, BHP walks away from Anglo American, leaving the path clear for $60 billion merger
item.description: BHP made one last-gasp attempt to seduce Anglo but it looks like they have now accepted defeat.

item.title: Is it finally ‘game over’ for AI and Big Tech stocks?
item.description: Potential Fed rate cut in December could reignite a ‘risk-on’ flame. Why the market looks to be in ‘early 1999’.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades Chinese internet services stock ahead of AI transformation
item.description: JPMorgan sees shares rising 69% from here.

item.title: Buy the dip on FanDuel parent's stock, says HSBC
item.description: HSBC sees shares of Flutter adding 18% from here.

item.title: BMO upgrades rare earth miner, sees no end in sight for massive rally
item.description: BMO Capital Markets sees shares of MP Materials adding another 36% to its massive year-to-date surge.

item.title: A U.S.-China trade truce means more localized technology. Here's how to play it

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 stocks for solid upside potential
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three stocks favored by Wall Street, including Microsoft and Booking Holdings.
